summary.span: 提供用來將物件加入至工作批次的方法。

Public Sub Add (work As IPendingWork, workItem As Object)

param.span: 與 workItem 物件建立關聯的 物件。

span.span: An object on which work is to be performed.

summary.span: 將暫止的工作項目加入至工作批次。

span.span: Adds a pending work item to a work batch.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法是用來將暫止的工作項目加入至工作批次。This method is used to add pending work items to a work batch. 加入至批次的 `workItem` 物件與 `work` 相關聯，該物件會實作 介面。The `workItem` object added to the batch is associated with `work`, an object that implements the interface. 將呼叫這個 物件提供的方法以處理 `workItem` 的最後認可。Methods provided by this object will be called to handle the eventual commit of the `workItem`. 服務會使用這個方法將暫止的工作加入至 。Services use this method to add pending work to the .
